column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Her soul is trapped in the Spirit World . "
#Text=I 've tried to keep her energy flowing , but I can feel her slipping away .
#Text=You 're the only one who can help her now , Mom .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " How much longer can she survive like this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't know , but she is very strong to have lasted this long .
